attributes.action: ensure that claims for DLA that are incorrectly awarded down in error should be looked at imediately requested to ensure that the error made by the DWP does not result in hardship for the applicant who can longer afford the cost of care as a direct result of an error mage by the DWP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been in receipt of DLA for 9 years now. I have always been awarded the high rate care because I need somebody to be awake and caring for me during the night as and when I cannot sleep. I pay a carer on a contract with funding from the Local Authority Direct Payment which is topped up with the highter rate care allowance.  This has been taken away and replaced with the middle rate which means that I can no longer have care every night of the week which I need.  This decision could well result in hardship for me, and puts me at risk of injury or worse as a direct result.  DLA is intended to help people like me.  What do I have to do, die?  I have been advised today that the DLA have up to 11 weeks to review their decision, even if they have made an error. They cannot be held responsible if I suffer as a result.
